description: A new girl at school who doesn`t talk much because of a curse a Youkai has placed on her, which Natsume later helps her to break. She`s an omniyojist. She can`t actually see youkai but she is able to once she uses a stick to draw a magic circle. One of Natsume`s friends, Nishimura, has a crush on her, but thinks that she and Natsume are going out.
name: Taki Tooru
